name: Fractions
description:
Fractions - A simple 2D fraction / battle game (Made with Processing)

Create maps and let different fractions battle against each other

STILL IN DEVELOPMENT

What you can currently do:

  • run a demo battle

Features that will be added:

  • Map editor
  • Saving and loading system
  • environment based stats
  • better visuals for map

Bugs or unfinished things you might encounter:

  • scoreboard stats are weird
  • order of added fractions matters in fights
